articles.author: Janie Boschma, Daniel Wolfe, Meghna Maharishi, Priya Krishnakumar, Christopher Hickey and David Wright, CNN
articles.title: Census release shows America is more diverse and more multiracial than ever - CNN
articles.description: Non-Hispanic White Americans continue to be the most prevalent group in every state, except for in California, Hawaii and New Mexico, as well as in the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico.
articles.content:
By Janie Boschma, Daniel Wolfe, Meghna Maharishi, Priya Krishnakumar, Christopher Hickey and David Wright, CNN

articles.author: Derek Hawkins, Laurie McGinley, Lena H. Sun
articles.title: Americans are sneaking extra coronavirus shots as officials weigh who should get them - The Washington Post
articles.description: The trend reflects broad public confusion about the protection offered by the vaccines at a critical time in the nation’s pandemic response, with the hyper-transmissible delta variant causing infections and hospitalizations to soar.
articles.content: Then came a drumbeat of reports showing the Johnson & Johnson shots might not offer the same level of immunity as other vaccines. Worried she might develop a breakthrough infection or worse, face… [+11122 chars]

articles.author: Spencer Kimball
articles.title: U.S. deploying 3,000 troops to help evacuate Afghan embassy staff as Taliban advances - CNBC
articles.description: The U.S. embassy warned its ability to assist Americans is "extremely limited even within Kabul" due to deteriorating security and reduced staffing.
articles.content: The U.S. is deploying 3,000 troops to Afghanistan in order to facilitate the drawdown of the U.S. Embassy in Kabul to a "core diplomatic presence," as Taliban militants rapidly advance toward the Afg… [+4729 chars]
